## Field.getAbsoluteXY\_() method

Return the absolute coordinates of the top-left corner of this field. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the page body.  Object with .x and .y properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getAbsoluteXY_(): Coordinate;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Coordinate
